title: How to Make Golden Syrup Pudding

steps.headline: Place the dry ingredients into a mixing bowl.
steps.description: Add the butter cut into chunks and rub in with your fingers.

steps.headline: Add the milk gradually and mix to form a smooth and light pudding mixture.
Pour the pudding mixture into a greased pudding basin.
Make the sauce.
steps.description: Melt the sauce ingredients in a saucepan. When combined, pour over the pudding mixture in the basin.

steps.headline: Steam the pudding for  1/12 hours uncovered.
Add more sauce for serving if preferable.

text: Place the dry ingredients into a mixing bowl. Add the butter cut into chunks and rub in with your fingers. Add the milk gradually and mix to form a smooth and light pudding mixture.  Pour the pudding mixture into a greased pudding basin.  Make the sauce. Melt the sauce ingredients in a saucepan. When combined, pour over the pudding mixture in the basin. Steam the pudding for  1/12 hours uncovered.  Add more sauce for serving if preferable.
